## AsyncReporter interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Reporter that supports async operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface AsyncReporter 
```

## Remarks

Use this interface for reporters that need to perform I/O, such as writing to files or making network requests.
